response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am delighted to present our premium product, which I believe would significantly enhance your operations or personal endeavors. Given its immense value to you, I propose a special introductory offer of $7,500 for this exceptional item. This price reflects my commitment to making high-quality solutions accessible while ensuring a fair return on investment for me. I look forward to your positive response and the opportunity to contribute to your success. Kind regards, Alice", "product_price": 7500}
